alert.note: Alert for Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:04PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN LICKING COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 404 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Utica, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Utica, St. Louisville, Purity, US Route 62 at State Route 661 and Fallsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
